title: Opinion: UK Airport Kicking Incident: The 'Civilised' West Needs To Do Some Soul-Searching
content: While Tuesday's incident at Manchester Airport may not have the severity of some past events, it still is an example of systemic racism and the West's inflated self-image poisoning institutions.
summary: While Tuesday's incident at Manchester Airport may not have the severity of some past events, it still is an example of systemic racism and the West's inflated self-image poisoning institutions.

title: Elon Musk's Ex-Girlfriend Comes Out In Support Of His Transgender Daughter
content: Elon Musk's former partner Grimes recently spoke out in support of the billionaire's estranged transgender daughter Vivian Jenna Wilson.
summary: Elon Musk's former partner Grimes recently spoke out in support of the billionaire's estranged transgender daughter Vivian Jenna Wilson.

title: This 6-Tonne Spacecraft Will Flyby Earth, Then Slingshot To Jupiter
content: A spacecraft launched last year will slingshot back around Earth and the Moon next month in a high-stakes, world-first manoeuvre as it pinballs its way through the Solar System to Jupiter.
summary: A spacecraft launched last year will slingshot back around Earth and the Moon next month in a high-stakes, world-first manoeuvre as it pinballs its way through the Solar System to Jupiter.

title: Donald Trump Calls Kamala Harris, Married To A Jewish Man, An Anti-Semite
content: US presidential candidate Donald Trump falsely accused election rival Kamala Harris of being an anti-Semite who plans to allow the murder of newborn babies, in a speech meant to rally religious supporters Friday that quickly went off the rails.
summary: US presidential candidate Donald Trump falsely accused election rival Kamala Harris of being an anti-Semite who plans to allow the murder of newborn babies, in a speech meant to rally religious supporters Friday that quickly went off the rails.

title: How Kamala Harris Is Re-Energising Young Voters
content: Kamala Harris has reinvigorated the Democratic ticket and inspired the voters they need most: women, African-Americans and youth. But it's not all smooth sailing.
summary: Kamala Harris has reinvigorated the Democratic ticket and inspired the voters they need most: women, African-Americans and youth. But it's not all smooth sailing.

title: "Cat Lady, Brat": Media Attacks On Kamala Harris Follow A Bleak Pattern
content: Kamala Harris is the presumptive Democratic presidential nominee. And while she will not be the Democrat's first woman nominee, nor the first person of colour, she faces the compounding challenge of being both.
summary: Kamala Harris is the presumptive Democratic presidential nominee. And while she will not be the Democrat's first woman nominee, nor the first person of colour, she faces the compounding challenge of being both.

title: 'Fake' CrowdStrike Worker Takes Credit For French Rail Network Collapse
content: A tweet claiming responsibility for a global Microsoft outage triggered a meme fest on X. Today, the same man has returned with another post, this time taking credit for the chaos that ensued after three arson attacks on France's railways.
summary: A tweet claiming responsibility for a global Microsoft outage triggered a meme fest on X. Today, the same man has returned with another post, this time taking credit for the chaos that ensued after three arson attacks on France's railways.

title: Children Of Indian-American Immigrants Face Deportation As Time Runs Out
content: There does not seem to any light at the end of the tunnel for children of legal immigrants, a significantly large number of whom are Indian-Americans who came to the US as a young kid with their parents and now risk being deported back.
summary: There does not seem to any light at the end of the tunnel for children of legal immigrants, a significantly large number of whom are Indian-Americans who came to the US as a young kid with their parents and now risk being deported back.

title: Wealth Of World's Top 1% Grew By $42 Trillion Over The Past Decade: Oxfam
content: The world's richest one per cent increased their fortune by $42 trillion over the past decade, which is nearly 34 times more than the entire bottom 50 per cent of the world's population, according to a new analysis by Oxfam.
summary: The world's richest one per cent increased their fortune by $42 trillion over the past decade, which is nearly 34 times more than the entire bottom 50 per cent of the world's population, according to a new analysis by Oxfam.

title: Trump's Running Mate On Why He Called Kamala Harris "Childless Cat Lady"
content: JD Vance, former US President Donald Trump's running mate, has defended his 2021 remarks where he referred to Democratic politicians as a "bunch of childless cat ladies with miserable lives".
summary: JD Vance, former US President Donald Trump's running mate, has defended his 2021 remarks where he referred to Democratic politicians as a "bunch of childless cat ladies with miserable lives".

title: 180,000 Gazans Displaced In 4 Days As Israeli Aggression Continues
content: More than 180,000 Palestinians have fled fierce fighting around the southern Gaza city of Khan Yunis in four days, the United Nations said Friday, after an Israeli operation to extract captives' bodies from the area.
summary: More than 180,000 Palestinians have fled fierce fighting around the southern Gaza city of Khan Yunis in four days, the United Nations said Friday, after an Israeli operation to extract captives' bodies from the area.

title: FBI Confirms Donald Trump Was Hit By Bullet In Assassination Attempt
content: Former US president Donald Trump was indeed hit by an assassin's bullet or a fragment of one, the Federal Bureau of Investigation said Friday.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump was indeed hit by an assassin's bullet or a fragment of one, the Federal Bureau of Investigation said Friday.

title: This Pakistani City Is Ranked Second-Riskiest For Tourists
content: Karachi has been ranked as the second-riskiest city for tourists, with a rating of 93.12 out of 100, according to a July 11 Forbes Adviser list, reported Dawn.
summary: Karachi has been ranked as the second-riskiest city for tourists, with a rating of 93.12 out of 100, according to a July 11 Forbes Adviser list, reported Dawn.

title: EU Takes Action Against France, 5 Nations Over Budget Rule Violation
content: France, Italy and five other EU countries were placed in a formal procedure on Friday for violating the bloc's budget rules, a step that could lead to unprecedented penalties unless they take corrective measures.
summary: France, Italy and five other EU countries were placed in a formal procedure on Friday for violating the bloc's budget rules, a step that could lead to unprecedented penalties unless they take corrective measures.

title: Russia Working Hard To Reverse "Terribly Low" Birth Rate, Says Kremlin
content: The Kremlin said Friday that it was "working hard" to reverse declining birth rates in Russia, warning that "disastrous" demographic trends were putting the country's future at risk.
summary: The Kremlin said Friday that it was "working hard" to reverse declining birth rates in Russia, warning that "disastrous" demographic trends were putting the country's future at risk.

title: Israel Army Preparing For "Decisive Offensive" Against Hezbollah
content: An Israeli military commander said Friday that troops in the country's north were preparing for "a decisive offensive" against Lebanon's Hezbollah after months of deadly cross-border exchanges.
summary: An Israeli military commander said Friday that troops in the country's north were preparing for "a decisive offensive" against Lebanon's Hezbollah after months of deadly cross-border exchanges.

title: Indian Duped On Promise Of Job Returns From Saudi, Says Embassy
content: The Indian Embassy in Saudi Arabia on Friday confirmed the return of an Indian national who was stranded in the Gulf nation after being duped by an agent who had promised getting him a job in Qatar.
summary: The Indian Embassy in Saudi Arabia on Friday confirmed the return of an Indian national who was stranded in the Gulf nation after being duped by an agent who had promised getting him a job in Qatar.

title: Mexican Drug Lord Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada Pleads Not Guilty To US Charges
content: Alleged Mexican kingpin Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada has pleaded not guilty to U.S. drug trafficking charges, court records showed on Friday, after he and a son of another drug lord were arrested on Thursday in El Paso, Texas.
summary: Alleged Mexican kingpin Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada has pleaded not guilty to U.S. drug trafficking charges, court records showed on Friday, after he and a son of another drug lord were arrested on Thursday in El Paso, Texas.

title: Israeli PM Netanyahu Meets Donald Trump For Talks Seeking To Ease Tensions
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu visited former U.S. President Donald Trump at Trump's Florida resort on Friday for a meeting that could ease tensions between two leaders who forged a close alliance during Trump's years in the White House.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu visited former U.S. President Donald Trump at Trump's Florida resort on Friday for a meeting that could ease tensions between two leaders who forged a close alliance during Trump's years in the White House.

title: Court Convicts Man After Woman Dies At "Slapping Therapy" Workshop In UK
content: An alternative healer was on Friday found guilty of the manslaughter by gross negligence of a diabetic woman who died from medical complications at a "slapping therapy" workshop in the UK.
summary: An alternative healer was on Friday found guilty of the manslaughter by gross negligence of a diabetic woman who died from medical complications at a "slapping therapy" workshop in the UK.
